snippet: Three military advisers were deployed to Somalia last month to help provide logistics, planning and communication assistance to forces combating the Islamic militant group.
abstract: Pentagon sends small team of uniformed military advisers to Somalia to help provide logistics, planning and communication assistance to forces combating Islamic militant group Shabab.
lead_paragraph: Three military advisers were deployed to Somalia last month to help provide logistics, planning and communication assistance to forces combating the Islamic militant group.

headline.main: U.S. Advisers Sent to Help Somalia Fight the Shabab
headline.print_headline: U.S. Advisers Sent to Help Somalia Fight The Shabab
